---
title: "sra toolkit tutorial"
format: pdf
editor: visual
---

-   create data working directory

-   preset download to working directory

    ``` command line
    vdb-config --prefetch-to-cwd
    ```

-   download the file

    ``` command line
    prefetch [SRA-id-number]
    ```

-   use fasterq-dump to extract the file
